mapper.select: SELECT player_no as playerNo, player_name as playerName, country as country, birth_date as birthDate, height as height, weight as weight, player_position as playerPosition FROM player WHERE player_no = #{playerNo}

SELECT team_name as teamName, player_no as playerNo, contract_start as contractStart, contract_end as contractEnd, salary as salary, transfer_fee as transferFee, uniform_back_number as uniformBackNumber FROM player_contract WHERE player_no = #{playerNo}
